io.mosip.kernel.masterdata.controller

Class DocumentTypeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mosip.kernel.masterdata.controller.DocumentTypeController

  • @RestController
public class DocumentTypeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Document type controller with api to get list of valid document types based on document category code type and language code and with api to create document types.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Uday Kumar, Ritesh Sinha
